name: (Mis) Lead Me
description:
(Mis) Lead Me is a funny game about (sort of ) everyday tasks that you must complete to win. The only catch, well, there are lots of catches. This game will attempt in every way possible to lie to you and mislead you into losing. As a 14 year old game dev, this is my first game jam and although you may not find the game itself all that great, I had a blast making it and hope to do more fun projects such as this in the future. Anyway hope you enjoy!!

CONTROLS :

MOUSE - Selection of most objects and main controller

*Only Applies for Final Level*:

SCROLL/MOUSE - Flip Pages

KEYBOARD NUMBERS - For numbers on keypad
